title: Prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees her dream, she is praying in comfort and reassurance. The dream indicates that this girl will be happy soon. She is a good and religious girl who will live comfortably and steadily in the coming days. If the unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is getting up to pray, She prays in the mosque, and there were many. This vision indicates that this girl will get engaged in the next few days. Her fiancé will be an educated man, with high morals, from a respectable family. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying but she does not pray. This vision shows that This girl is paralyzed and following a bad path. She is not creative and must return to herself and change her condition. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is praying with the worshipers, this dream indicates that goodness and joy will come to her and that she will live in a state of stability and tranquility in the coming period. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is praying and crying during prayer, this dream indicates that this girl is troubled and unhappy in her life. She is trying to get rid of the problems that she faces in life, but she cannot overcome them easily. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream She was praying and she was optimistic, but she was thinking a lot. This vision shows that this girl is afraid and confused about her engagement, but she will call for rest and a decision. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is praying with her husband, then she is happy. This dream indicates that this woman is comfortable in her life. She is happy with her husband, loves him, takes care of her children, and raises morale. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying at home, she feels confused. This dream indicates that this woman is thinking a lot about her life, but she will calm down and be Quiet and comfortable in the coming days. If a married woman sees prayer in her dream, she is sorry. The dream indicates that this woman is not happy with her husband and does not love him. He treats her badly and does not respect her, and this leads to divorce between them. But if a married woman sees in her dream that her husband calls her to pray But she does not pray. This vision shows that this woman is doing wrong things. She does not respect her husband and does not appreciate his work at work and that she is immoral. If a married woman dreams that she is praying with her family but gets tired in prayer. This vision indicates that this woman will suffer from symptoms Illness. It will be serious, and you will not be able to treat it easily. On the other hand, if a married woman sees prayer in her dream, and she prays while she is happy. This dream indicates that this woman will soon hear happy news about her pregnancy and the birth of a good child. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream For a man, its meaning from a dream is that he is praying and performing ablution for prayer. The dream indicates that this person does good deeds and loves to feed the poor. He is a man with an excellent personality and is loved among men, and loves communicating with men. When a person sees praying in his sleep, he rejoices. This dream indicates that this man is...

title: I dreamed that I was in a church and that I was a Muslim

preview.html: I dreamed that I was in a church and I was a Muslim in the dream through the vision website roy2a.com, where Christians worship and hold Christian religious ceremonies in the church and the Muslim dreamer may be surprised to see that he is in the church in the dream. So what is the meaning of the vision and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was in a church And that I am a Muslim. According to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was in a church and that I am a Muslim. Seeing a Muslim woman in a church in a dream indicates that she has committed many sins and transgressions in her life, and God knows best. A Muslim woman praying in a church in a dream indicates that someone close to her is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing a Muslim in a church in a dream indicates the death of a loved one, and God knows best. Praying in a church in a man’s dream declares that he is a deceitful person and is always surrounded by hypocrisy. See another interpretation: Interpretation of seeing prayer. In the church in a dream. Seeing in a dream the entrance to the church by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of entering the church and crying in a dream. It indicates many worries and sorrows in the dreamer’s life during the coming period. Seeing the church in a dream indicates a woman who is not healthy in the dreamer’s life and who commits many evils, and God knows best. The church in a dream indicates the dreamer’s distance from his Lord and the commission of many sins and disobedience in his life. Reading the Qur’an inside the church in a dream indicates that the dreamer gets rid of all evil people in his life. Seeing the cross inside the church in a dream indicates the closest divine marriage, and God knows best. See an interpretation. Another: Interpretation of seeing a church in a dream. I see myself entering a church in a dream about Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing a single person entering a church in a dream. It indicates his marriage next season, and God knows best. Entering a monastery in a dream states that God will have a great status and a prominent position in society. Seeing a church in a dream indicates That the dreamer is a person who has wisdom and reason and is close to God. The church in a dream may also indicate that the dreamer will go through a difficult period full of worries and sorrows. See another interpretation: Interpretation of a blessing in a dream. Seeing them entering the church in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman entering the church in a dream indicates... Marriage is near, and God knows best. Entering a church in a student’s dream says that she will be very successful and successful in her academic life. Seeing a church in one dream indicates entering the marital home in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman entering a church in a dream. Seeing a married woman entering a church in a dream indicates that God He will carry her soon, and God knows best. Hearing the sound of the church bell in a married woman’s dream indicates the emergence of many crises in her life during the coming period, and God knows best. A married woman sees her husband ringing the church bell in a dream, which indicates her husband reaching a high position and a prominent position in his professional life. Seeing a pregnant woman Entering a church in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman entering a church in a dream

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a hookah in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a hookah in a dream is one of the visions that reflects the feeling of confusion that the dreamer suffers from in many things around him. Seeing a hookah in a dream indicates negative energy surrounding this person. Also, seeing a hookah in a dream indicates mood swings that the dreamer is suffering in the dream during this period, financial crises, and personal problems during this period. Hookah in a dream Hookah in a dream generally indicates the bad psychological state that the dreamer is going through. As for smoking a hookah in a dream, it is a sign However, the visionary person has made some decisions in his life, including abandoning some people who committed unforgivable mistakes against him. Seeing a hookah in a dream means that the problems did not succeed in defeating the dreamer, but rather he is the one who wins them to get rid of these problems, eliminate them, and eliminate them. On it. The hookah in the dream also shows that the dreamer will overcome the bad days he is experiencing thanks to his strong will and faith in God. The hookah in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing the hookah in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s feeling of confusion throughout his life. If the dreamer sees that he smokes the hookah in his dream, This indicates ill health and the approach of death. But if the sleeper sees that the hookah smoke is white and clean, this means that all his desires will be fulfilled. While the dreamer’s vision symbolizes that he smokes hookah and does not smoke in reality, it indicates that he will fall into a great misfortune. When The dreamer sees himself smoking in a place where smoking is prohibited, this indicates boredom and frustration. If you see the desire to smoke a hookah in a dream, this means getting rid of some mental and nervous diseases. Sitting with someone you know who smokes in a dream, means many disputes that will arise between them and end In a quarrel. Shisha in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Seeing smoking in a dream for everyone has different meanings and interpretations and is determined by the dreamer’s personality and what happens in the vision. Seeing one’s wife smoking a lot in a dream symbolizes the suffering and problems she goes through in life and is said to be conflicts and crises between spouses. Dreaming of smoking a lot It means pressure, tension, and suffering for whoever sees it. To dream of smoking in a state of anxiety and sadness means that you will suffer from injustice, oppression, and bad words that are spoken to whoever sees it. Seeing smoking from which black smoke evaporates in a dream symbolizes hypocrisy and gossip, and it is said to be sadness and behavior. Immorality and failure to adhere to religious matters. The online dream interpretation site is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. The online dream interpretation site. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Hookah in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees that she smokes a lot, this indicates An unmarried woman is afflicted with evil from some people around her who are trying to harm her in her life. If an unmarried woman is seen smoking hookah or cigarettes while she is happy, this means bad luck from a friend and he will take what you have. There is another interpretation:

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about selling gold bullion in a dream, we will consider these interpretations given in relation to the interpretation of the dream of selling gold bullion in a dream, for men and women, and other details.Interpretation of the dream of selling gold bullion in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of selling gold bullion in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems God willing, when the dreamer sees that he is selling gold bullion, it may relieve him of his worries, and God knows best. If a married woman sees gold bullion, then she may express anxiety and sorrow, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself pulling gold bullion from the ground, this may indicate that he will enter into a difficult task, and God knows best. The unseen. Interpretation of a dream about selling an old car in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about selling an old car in a dream can lead to staying away from bad friends, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself selling an old car in a dream, this may indicate paying off debts, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees Himself selling an old car in a dream, this may indicate recovery, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person buying sweets In a dream, seeing the deceased buying sweets in a dream may indicate a good aura that may reach the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased was buying sweets, this may be a sign of the extensive diet that comes to the dreamer at that time. In the event that You saw a deceased person buying sweets in a dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring to the dreamer during these days. Buying sweets in a dream from a dead person may indicate great material gains that will come to the dreamer in the coming period, thanks to God. title: Interpretation of drowning in a river or sea in a dream, meaning of a dream of drowning

preview.html: Explanation of the case of drowning in the poolInterpretation of drowning in the sandInterpretation of drowning in a dreamDrowning in the mudInterpretation of drowning in the streamInterpretation of drowning in the sea and coming out of itInterpretation of drowning in a dream by Ibn SirinWhoever dreams of drowning and diving in the sea will be destroyed by the Sultan, and if he sees that he has drowned and is forced to dive again and again and move his arms and legs He acquires wealth and state. Dream of drowning: Whoever dreams that he drowned in the sea and then escapes from it, then he will drown in worldliness and sorrows and then get rid of them. He has drowned in the worries of the world, as some Arabs say, so-and-so and so-and-so is drowning in bliss. Whoever sees in a dream that he has drowned is in Hell for the sake of the word of God: And whoever dreams that he is drowning, he will commit many sins, and if he dies in his drowning, he fears disbelief, or drowning. In heresies. And if he goes out and does not drown, then his worldly affairs will lead to the uprightness of his religion, and if he wears a green garment, he will attain knowledge and piety. And if he drowns and dives to the bottom of the sea, the Sultan will become angry with him or torture him and he will die in this torture. And if the infidel sees himself drowning in the sea, he believes the saying Al-Ali: (Until drowning drowns him. He said: I believe that there is no god except the one in whom the children of Israel believed, and I am one of the Muslims. And whoever dreams of his death drowning in water is almost his enemy. Drowning in clean water is drowning in a lot of money. Drowning is not good, because God Almighty drowned Noah’s people. And Pharaoh and others. Drowning: Whoever dreams that he is drowning is in hell, and whoever sees that he is drowning in the sea and sinks and floats, then he is drowning in worldly affairs and content with himself. Miller’s interpretation of drowning in a dreamIf you dream that you are drowning, this means loss of wealth and life, but if you survive, You will rise from your current position to a rich and honorable position. If you see others drowning and see yourself trying to save them, it means that you will help a friend rise to high positions, and this will bring you the happiness you deserve. If a girl dreams that she sees her lover drowning, this indicates the death of her father or mother. Some see that the sea in a dream or drowning in it is a bad thing and a sign of the proximity of evil, but in reality I repeat and state that there is no single sign of the symbol and that it is necessary to listen to the entire vision with all its symbols. But while we are now talking about this symbol, I say that the sign is about the sea or about drowning in it is not always bad, because it can indicate, for example: to the student, that his knowledge and specialization are deepening, and as for the merchant, perhaps the sea is the market in which he works, For the sinner and the sinner, it may be a profound repentance and contemplation of the Almighty’s saying: There is no god. Rather, he is the one in whom the children of Israel believed.” (Yunus: 90). The sign of swimming, drowning, and drowning in the sea is good when you see the sea in the summer, but seeing it in the winter could be a bad sign, but I repeat that it is necessary to consider the rest of the symbols of the dream and what is said. About some of the bad connotations of swimming, diving, or drowning in the sea: 1- Committing disobedience and many sins, and meditating on the Almighty’s saying: [Because of their sins they were drowned, and they were admitted to the Fire, but they found no helpers for them besides God.] Nuh: 252 - Indulging in this world and its pleasures. But it is necessary. perhaps

title: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and seeing a soft snake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream: Seeing a snake in a dream has more than one meaning. It is one of the poisonous reptiles that scares people if they actually see it spreading in forests or deserted places. Who is waiting for an opportunity to harm the dreamer, and many other meanings. Seeing a snake in a dream may be one of the dreams in which many scholars agree that it is a symbol of evil in many of its details, and given the multiplicity of colors of life, we find that each color has a distinct meaning. We learn about all this through the following points: Seeing a snake in front of the house so that a person cannot get out is a symbol of many obstacles that are placed on him so that it is not easy for him to reach his ambition, and it is also a type of hatred and hostility. Entering the house in a woman’s dream is evidence of betrayal. Her husband and his involvement with another woman who wants to tempt him away from his children and wife, and unfortunately she reciprocates. Eliminating him means ending the source of problems and annoyances that have plagued the dreamer’s life with his partner for a long time. As for eating it in a dream, it means achieving victory and victory for the dreamer over his fiercest and fiercest enemies. Seeing the head of A snake among the trees is evidence of his wisdom and intelligence, which makes him make the right decisions at the right times. Seeing a snake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin said that it often expresses a cheerful woman who enters a person’s life, whether married or single, only to ruin him and destroy his happiness and the stability of his family. The snake in Ibn Sirin’s dream is a sign that evil is befalling him and he must beware of the people closest to him, especially if he sees that there are many disturbances in his life whose source he does not know. From his point of view, he has no enemies in the arena in which he works. They may be very close to him but he does not know. If The fortuneteller turned himself into a snake. He is a fickle and climbing person who does not hesitate to do anything, as long as it brings him personal interest. As for the case when he was bitten by a snake in his sleep and the poison entered his veins, he benefits from the money of a wealthy woman and marries her, but he lives in obedience to her and does not He could contradict her in anything. Case. I know more than 2000 interpretations by Ibn Sirin. The Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman. Depending on the psychological state that the girl is going through at the present time, we find the interpretation. If she is happy and communicates with the same young man whom she loves, then she must warn that there is another girl approaching her. And you try. To tempt him with it. And if he sees it as an irreplaceable opportunity, he must fight to keep it. But if she finds it in her bed, then this is a desperate attempt by a woman from the same family who wants to prevent her from marrying with repulsive magical methods. Sneaking into a girl’s house is a sign of that friend who believes that she is more Her person is sincere and sincere, and she is surprised that she is the traitor who leaks her secrets and smears her reputation in front of everyone with the information. He knows about her. When you can eliminate her with a sharp object, she is definitely a girl with special abilities to take advantage of, and she will have a bright future, especially if she is still studying. That she closes the door before the snake enters is proof that she is alert and

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is one of the dreams that a large number of people see and are searching for meaning and meaning for them. Today, let us learn about all the important interpretations and signals that speak of this vision in detail. Interpretation of the dream of seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing yourself You go to the eye doctor in a dream is a sign of hearing good news at that time. The dream of visiting an eye doctor in a dream for a married woman is a sign that she is a social person who shares the joys and sorrows of people. Seeing yourself dreaming of going to the eye doctor is a sign of business... Goodness and comfort near God Almighty. The dream of going to an ophthalmologist in a dream is a sign of unhappiness from all the diseases that you are suffering from at that time. Interpretation of the dream of visiting a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams of going to the doctor is a sign of his need to correct his mistakes and problems at that time If a person sees that he is going to the doctor in a dream, this is an indication of getting rid of diseases and problems and enjoying good health. Dreaming of visiting a doctor in a dream is a sign of getting rid of problems and crises in life at that time. When someone sees that he is going to the doctor, this is a sign of He will get rid of sins and disobedience and will become closer to God Almighty. Interpretation: I dreamed that I became a doctor in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. If a married woman sees that she has become a doctor, this is evidence of correcting the mistakes and problems that she is going through at that time. To see yourself entering and graduating from medical school and working in a profession. Medicine is a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams at that time. A person dreams that his daughter is a doctor in a dream, a sign of distinction in life and a large income. When a person dreams that he has become a doctor, this is a sign that he is suffering from many problems that he is trying to get rid of at that time Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth at a doctor in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a visit to a dental clinic to clean teeth indicates his need to get rid of the crises and problems that he suffers from. The interpretation of seeing someone going to the dentist to clean his teeth is a sign of getting rid of sins and transgressions and getting closer to God Almighty. When A married woman sees that she is going to the dentist for cleaning, then this is a sign that good things will come to her life in the coming period. A common girl’s dream of having her teeth cleaned at the dentist is evidence of her marriage to a good young man at that time. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dentist in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a dentist Extracting a tooth in a dream is a sign that you will get rid of problems during this period. The interpretation of seeing a dentist in a dream is a sign that you will get rid of problems and crises in life in the coming days. If an ordinary girl sees a dentist extracting her teeth, this is a sign that someone What limits her life and harms her. Dreaming about a dentist in a dream about a married woman is a sign that she is trying to get rid of the things that are ruining her life during this time. Interpretation of visiting a gynecologist in a dream by Ibn Si

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with my ex-husband?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with my ex-lover: It is one of the confusing visions that the dreamer can often see as a result of reflecting what is happening in her subconscious mind and her desire to return to her ex-husband again, but in the event that the dreamer is not thinking about the partner and does not want to return to him, This leads to many things, some of which carry good news and others symbolize the emergence of some evil, according to the events of the dream in each case. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in bed with my ex-lover Seeing the ex-husband of a divorced woman in bed with her indicates that this insight will gain a higher status in work and is a sign of On her high status at work and an indication that her words will be heard by people. To dream that you are sleeping in bed next to your divorced ex-husband indicates that some material gains will be achieved and she will earn a lot of money through work. The dreamer who sees her ex-partner sitting next to her in bed looks sad and cries. Because of the dream that symbolizes this man’s feeling of sadness and sadness, and some separation from her, and an indication of his desire to return to her again. If a divorced woman sees in her dream her ex-husband sitting on the bed next to her, this symbolizes an improvement in the viewer’s psychological and nervous state and is a sign of liberation from distress and salvation. Of the torment you live in. Seeing a divorced woman from her ex-husband sleeping next to her in bed and smiling is a dream that indicates abundant livelihood and the appearance of abundant goodness. The dreamer who sees in her dream her ex-husband next to her in bed in a dream, and this symbolizes this woman’s desire to return to this man and share her life with him. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping with my ex-husband by Ibn Sirin: A divorced woman who is looking for work, if she dreams that she is sleeping in the same bed as her ex-husband, this is an indication that this woman will join a new job opportunity through which she will earn a living and provide a decent living. Seeing the ex-husband crying in A dream in which he sits next to the fortuneteller in bed is one of the dreams that symbolizes his feeling of remorse and sadness as a result of the mistakes he committed in his relationship with this woman. A divorced woman, when she dreams that she is sitting on a bed with her husband, and then sees his family in the dream, is one of the dreams that lead to some transformations and developments in The dreamer's life is often for the better. A divorced woman sleeping with her partner in the same bed indicates an improvement in the financial condition of the dreamer. Seeing the same divorced woman next to her ex-husband in bed is a dream that shows this dreamer's longing for her partner, and that she wants to return to the marital home again. Other. What is the interpretation of my ex-wife chasing me in a dream? The insight that she is observing her ex-husband chasing her to bond with her leads to a good situation, and getting rid of any problems and fears that this woman lives with. Seeing a divorced man chasing his ex-wife in a dream symbolizes his regret over the separation and his desire to Getting back together again. A divorced woman, when she dreams of being chased by her ex-husband, is one of the dreams that indicates that the separation took place against her will, and that she wants to return to her partner. Seeing a divorced woman
